about_the_game:
Begin your next journey now with Age of Wonders 4: Herald of Glory. This pack is available instantly when purchasing expansion pass 2* and includes unique items to assert your dominion over the Astral Sea:

  • New Leader Costume with a Winged Helm
  • New Lance of Glory Weapon for Heroes and Leaders
  • Regal Pegasus Mounts: A flying horse that can be used for heroes and as a racial mount
  • Swift Marchers Society Trait: A new society trait based on quickly marching into battle

*This content might be made purchasable individually at a later date
